message.content:
cs.CR, cs.IR, cs.SE, cs.CY, cs.HC 

The paper focuses on investigating information security risks of mobile device use within organizations, which falls under the category of computer security (cs.CR). The study also involves analyzing the behavior of employees and their compliance with corporate policies, which relates to information retrieval (cs.IR) and software engineering (cs.SE). Additionally, the paper discusses the potential legal implications of security breaches, which could be categorized under cyber law (cs.CY). Finally, the study involves analyzing the usability and human-computer interaction aspects of mobile device use within organizations, which could be related to human-computer interaction (cs.HC).
